description: This file defines a TodoModel class that manages a list of todo items, including methods to add, toggle, remove, update, and clear todos. It also includes a nanoid function for generating unique IDs and exports the TodoModel as the default export.

methods.name: nanoid
methods.description: Generates a unique ID string of specified size using a custom alphabet.

methods.name: TodoModel
methods.description: Creates a TodoModel object that manages a list of todos with methods to modify and retrieve them.
